name: I'm thinking about toasting myself - VR
name_original: I'm thinking about toasting myself - VR
description:
Escape Room VR - Game

In the middle of an anxiety attack, you find yourself stuck on a basement, that actually is located in your mind, there you'll find your deepest and darkest tought. You goal is to escape, and leave that thought behind.

This is a College Project  :)

Gameplay Walkthrough can be found in the video bellow:

Made by:

roguetaver

Nicole Sarvasi
